entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
